creator: agashlin@mozilla.com

comments.text:
Steps to reproduce:
1. Visit a reviewboard review such as the one in this bug's URL
2. Select several rows of text in a diff (for example the commit-message)
3. Copy the text, paste it elsewhere

No text is copied from the last line/row.

The best I was able to get from mozregression was:
https://hg.mozilla.org/mozilla-central/pushloghtml?fromchange=d719ac4bcbec13e0ba13a41547788e3bf365c679&tochange=e355cacefc881ba360d412853b57e8e060e966f4

Bug 1216001 looks suspicious.

There is a chance that this is a reviewboard bug, but it works before the regression and on Chrome (though it is using user-select: none instead of -moz-user-select: none on the <th>). I haven't been able to make a small static testcase of this so far, it might involve the way the tables are dynamically constructed.
comments.author: agashlin@mozilla.com

assigned_to_detail.name: nobody@mozilla.org
assigned_to_detail.real_name: Nobody; OK to take it and work on it

summary: Last row of selection in reviewboard does not get copied
